properties.name: Lofoten, Vesterålen and Senja
properties.desc: The sea areas off the coast of Lofoten, Vesterålen and Senja is the last area in Norway not opened for oil and gas extraction

properties.name: Canadian Tar Sands
properties.desc: Tar sand extraction in Canada is the number one contributer to the countrys greenhous gas emissions

properties.name: Phillipines Anti Coal
properties.desc: The fight against new coal mining in the Phillipines

properties.name: Yuani National Park
properties.desc: Since 2008 local groups have been fighting to preserve the Yuani National Park against oil extraction.

properties.name: Keystone XL Pipeline
properties.desc: The Keystone XL Pipline was first proposed in 2007 by the Trans-Canada. The pipeline would open up for export of crude oil from tar sand extraction.

properties.name: Great Australian Bight
properties.desc: BP is planning to drill for oil in the prestine sea areas of the Great Australia Bight.

properties.name: UK Fracking
properties.desc: Local communities across the UK are fighting various fracking projects which would put local water supplies in danger, increas earthquakes and increase UK's greenhous gas emissions.
